keyEvents.title: Five Elders Informed of Aokiji's Absence
keyEvents.description: Marines discover Admiral Aokiji has left headquarters without authorization, taking his bike to sea. The Five Elders are informed and express displeasure.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes that Aokiji operates independently and sets up his upcoming encounter with the Straw Hats.

description: The headquarters of the World Government's Marine forces, where the Fleet Admiral, Admirals, and other high-ranking officers are stationed.

name.japanese: セクシー・フォクシー号

keyEvents.title: Discovery of Ship Under New Command
keyEvents.description: Foxy, Hamburg, and Porche discover their ship is no longer under their control but has been taken over by Kibagaeru.
keyEvents.significance: Establishes the main conflict of the arc - Foxy must reclaim his ship through a Davy Back Fight.

keyEvents.title: Kibagaeru's Takeover Revealed
keyEvents.description: Kibagaeru announces he is the new captain of the ship and crew after Foxy's defeat.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the consequences of losing a Davy Back Fight.

keyEvents.title: Davy Back Fight Challenge Issued
keyEvents.description: Foxy challenges Kibagaeru to a Davy Back Fight on the ship to reclaim his position.
keyEvents.significance: Sets up the battle that will determine the ship's ownership.

description: The main vessel of the Foxy Pirates, known for its distinctive appearance and role in the Davy Back Fight competitions. In Episode 225, it is temporarily under Kibagaeru's control.

statusHistory.description: Temporarily controlled by Kibagaeru after mutiny

keyEvents.title: Navigating Through Storm
keyEvents.description: The Going Merry and Straw Hat crew navigate through a fierce storm under Nami's direction.
keyEvents.significance: Leads to the encounter with Foxy and his crewmates who need rescue.

keyEvents.title: Rescue of Foxy Pirates
keyEvents.description: The Straw Hats bring Foxy, Hamburg, and Porche aboard the Going Merry after rescuing them from the storm.
keyEvents.significance: Demonstrates Luffy's compassion and sets up Foxy's betrayal.

keyEvents.title: Foxy's Betrayal on the Merry
keyEvents.description: Foxy betrays the Straw Hats aboard their own ship, dumping them through a trapdoor.
keyEvents.significance: Shows the pirate world's harsh reality.

description: The Straw Hat Pirates' first ship, a caravel given to them by Kaya. In Episode 225, it serves as the vessel where the crew rescues Foxy and his crewmates during a storm.
